summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4563 for the improvement of West Wheeler Street, from 11th Avenue West to 12th Avenue West; by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53301, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
